content.raw: Before we consider merging this PR, I'd like to get feedback on [another PR targeting this one](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/49/consolidate-the-binary-output-directories/diff), because it will be important for allowing component tests to work correctly on Windows, but it will break backwards compatibility with a few of our projects.
content.html: Before we consider merging this PR, I'd like to get feedback on another PR targeting this one, because it will be important for allowing component tests to work correctly on Windows, but it will break backwards compatibility with a few of our projects.
